data.name: OLEG MONGOL
data.detailed_description:
History

Oleg Mongol - There is no information about the real name and biography of Oleg Mongol. It is only known that he lives in Khakassia (Chernogorsk).
Oleg Mongol registered on Instagram in February 2017. At the same time, a YouTube page appeared. Oleg's characteristic features are a rather unusual face appearance, as well as a dragon tattoo on his chest. In his videos, he appears in a company with friends, with whom he drinks alcohol and dances. Got the reputation of the King of Antiglamour.

Gameplay

You only need 4 keys (arrows), try to go through 10 levels, 10 different speeds, with each level the speed becomes faster and faster, one card (disco club), 10 different club soundtracks.
A classic game, you need to press the arrow keys on your keyboard in time to earn points. Explosive soundtracks, explosive arrows, explosive combinations! Try it too!

Features

  • Lots of animations
  • Dynamic multi-angle camera
  • 10 speeds (with each level the speed gets faster)
  • 10 club soundtracks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
